{"foo":2}
----
application/datalog
key{id: 3, parentID: 2, span: span{from: 1, to: 6}, text: "\"foo\""}
number{id: 5, parentID: 4, span: span{from: 7, to: 8}, text: "2"}
value{id: 4, number: 5, parentID: 2, span: span{from: 7, to: 8}}
keyValue{id: 2, key: 3, parentID: 1, span: span{from: 1, to: 8}, value: 4}
object{id: 1, keyValue: 2, parentID: 0, span: span{from: 0, to: 9}}
value{id: 0, object: 1, parentID: -1, span: span{from: 0, to: 9}}

{"foo":2,"bar":3}
----
application/datalog
key{id: 3, parentID: 2, span: span{from: 1, to: 6}, text: "\"foo\""}
number{id: 5, parentID: 4, span: span{from: 7, to: 8}, text: "2"}
value{id: 4, number: 5, parentID: 2, span: span{from: 7, to: 8}}
keyValue{id: 2, key: 3, parentID: 1, span: span{from: 1, to: 8}, value: 4}
key{id: 7, parentID: 6, span: span{from: 9, to: 14}, text: "\"bar\""}
number{id: 9, parentID: 8, span: span{from: 15, to: 16}, text: "3"}
value{id: 8, number: 9, parentID: 6, span: span{from: 15, to: 16}}
keyValue{id: 6, key: 7, parentID: 1, span: span{from: 9, to: 16}, value: 8}
object{id: 1, keyValue: 6, parentID: 0, span: span{from: 0, to: 17}}
value{id: 0, object: 1, parentID: -1, span: span{from: 0, to: 17}}
